title: S5 Ep3: The other great migration
itunes:title: The other great migration
description: In the 20th century at least 6 million African Americans migrated from poor southern states to northern cities to escape discrimination and poverty, changing the course of American history. At least as many whites also migrated, taking their ideas with them. Samuel Bazzi tells Tim Phillips that they have also influenced social structures and politics in the US.
itunes:author: VoxTalks
dc:creator: VoxTalks
